short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you to pull the latest reviews from review platforms. So you can show them on your website or sales pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our extension helps users show reviews from review platforms into their website. 


Steps to use it:


1. Log into https://app.wisernotify.com
2. Go to profile section and copy the API key
3. Now open the extension and enter the API key
4. Submit it and it will show the list of integrations(supported review platforms)
5. Now visit your review listing page URL, and click on sync in extension
6. Now the reviews will start syncing into your Wisernotify account and you can start displaying them into your website.


Supported platform:
Etsy
Apple
Capterra
Tripadvisor
Googleplay
Appsumo
Amazon
Edmunds
Houzz
Opentable
Booking
Reviews.io
G2
Ebay
